actions.Multiattack: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.
actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.Shortsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Heavy Crossbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.
